meanings.definition: The time at which the moon sets below the horizon.
meanings.sent1: Last night, the moonset was so early that I missed seeing it.
meanings.sent2: I always enjoy watching the moonset before going to bed.
meanings.sent3: The moonset decided to take a break and sleep in today.
meanings.sent4: As the moonset disappeared, the night embraced complete darkness.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the moonset left me in awe of nature's wonders.

meanings.definition: The act of the moon setting below the horizon.
meanings.sent1: The moonset was a peaceful event, signaling the end of the day.
meanings.sent2: During the moonset, the sky transforms into a canvas of colors.
meanings.sent3: The moonset tripped over the horizon, causing a celestial stumble.
meanings.sent4: Her departure was as graceful as a moonset over calm waters.
meanings.sent5: The moonset painted the sky with its gentle descent, a masterpiece in motion.
